subject: difference between product
description_text:
So im looking to get some new pedals. the simpson pro x ultra sim racing
pedal with haptic reactor optional; for just the two pedal, baseplate and
linear motor is $334.90.

for the newest pro x ultra rgb and reactor with just two pedals baseplate.
is $449

What is the difference between these two products? I cant find anything in
the technical sheets.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeremy Stillman,     Purchasing the Haptic Reactor through this link requires an additional fee, and the price is comparable to the bundled sale link.

So it's a $1.80 savings to buy the bundle?

The pedals and linear motors are all the same?
Yes, they are exactly the same.
